actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A resolution expressing the sense of Congress respecting action by the Consumer Product Safety Commission against defective home canning lids.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of Congress that the Consumer Product Safety Commission should promptly undertake a study of the sealing capabilities of container lids used in the canning of food in homes to determine: (1) if any defect in such capabilites constitutes a substantial product hazard; and (2) if a consumer product safety standard should be promulgated.

titles.title: A resolution expressing the sense of Congress respecting action by the Consumer Product Safety Commission against defective home canning lids.
